site_name: SAVE THEM ALL, LIFESAVERS RESCUE TRANSPORT

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:29am on October
4, 2022.
Upon arrival to the facility, the inspector attempted to contact the licensee via the phone number on file, leaving a
voicemail message and sending an email. The inspector waited 45 minutes before leaving the facility.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:29am on October 
4, 2022. 
 
Upon arrival to the facility, the inspector attempted to contact the licensee via the phone number on file, leaving a 
voicemail message and sending an email. The inspector waited 45 minutes before leaving the facility. 
 
 
 
End Section
